Title: Requires the authority install time-delay egress mechanisms on all emergency gates at all stations operated by the MTA
Summary: Requires the authority install time-delay egress mechanisms on all emergency gates at all stations operated by the MTA and how the MTA shall operate the time-delay egress mechanisms.
LawCode: Add ยง1279-j, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to expanding time-delay mechanisms on emergency exit gates
